Description:
Walk to your dreams!
Location is everything. With Chapel St shops, cafes, bars, clubs a two min walk away from this stylish 6th floor apartment, you'll never be far from the action.

Situated on the sundrenched north-facing 6th floor of the Kudos apartments, this gorgeous one bedroom plus balcony is complemented with designer fixtures and fittings, oak flooring and stone bench tops. Unwind on your full-width balcony, favoured by the sought-after northern aspect and sweeping views to Richmond and beyond. Features a spacious master bedroom with BIR's complete with floor to ceiling mirrors plus open plan kitchen/living area. This is the perfect first home or astute investment for ultimate sophisticated inner city living. Inspection will surely delight!

Description:
Convenience, Lifestyle, Central to Everything
Superbly located in the highly sought after South Yarra shopping and entertainment precinct, just off the trendy Chapel St with the shops, restaurants and bars all within an easy walk, this is South Yarra living at its best.
This one bedroom apartment features a light filled carpeted queen size bedroom with BIR and floor to ceiling windows. A stunning designer bathroom with oversized shower and top quality fittings, living area fitted with beautiful timber floors and a study nook, separate dinning area, super modern kitchen with gas cook top and electric European stainless steel appliances including oven and dishwasher and good size lounge with split heating/cooling system. European laundry, secure intercom entrance, a communal rooftop terrace that is great place to relax.
Walk to Dyeworks Park and just a short stroll to the Prahran Market, St Joseph's Primary School etc. All lifestyle amenities are within easy access.
